title: Music Percep & Cognition
description: The course will examine how humans process musical sound, covering the basics of the human auditory system and the experience of musical sound. Credit will not be awarded for both MUSI 4677 and MUSI 6001.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (CS 1301 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CS 1315 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CS 1371 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D)
